entry.title: Vite report on Fri, 11 Aug 2023 20:01:26
entry.summary:
Tech:
- Google AI Introduces AdaTape: A New AI Approach with a Transformer-based Architecture that Allows for Dynamic Computation in Neural Networks through Adaptive Tape Tokens
- Microsoft Warns Of Exchange Server Failures, Pulls August 8 Security Update
- ChatGPT and GPT-4 skew the most liberal — and Meta's LLaMA is the most conservative AI model, a new study says

Business:
- Eagle Asset Management Inc. Raises Stake in John Wiley & Sons ... - MarketBeat
- Country Garden, one of China's real-estate behemoths, could look at restructuring its debt after missing key interest payments this week: JPMorgan
- A German grocery store charged customers the 'true price' of their food, and one cheese was almost twice as expensive
- Saudi Arabia is about to send more oil to China, even though it's slashed crude supply levels
- Chinese online retailer Pinduoduo has a 'hyper-aggressive' culture with hours surpassing a '996' schedule, analysts write
- Victoria's Secret is getting slammed by Skims fans online. They're accusing the brand of ripping off Kim Kardashian's campaign.

AI:
- Google AI Introduces AdaTape: A New AI Approach with a Transformer-based Architecture that Allows for Dynamic Computation in Neural Networks through Adaptive Tape Tokens
- ChatGPT and GPT-4 skew the most liberal — and Meta's LLaMA is the most conservative AI model, a new study says

Others:
- Epigenetic profiling of the D4Z4 locus: Optimization of the protocol ... - John Wiley

- My company runs on a 4-day workweek. Our days can be intense but revenue has increased and we're never going back.
